name: IAP Receipt Verifier
description: A web app to verify App Store purchase receipts.

RECEIPT_VERIFICATION_ENVIRONMENT.description: The environment which to verify receipts. Can be 'production' or 'sandbox'.

APP_SPECIFIC_SHARED_SECRET.description: Your app's shared secret from iTunes Connect (a hexadecimal string).

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Must set this to 1. Don't edit this value.

SECRET_KEY.description: This should be set to a unique, unpredictable value.

BASE64_ENCODED_SIGNING_KEY.description: Optional. See README for information on what to provide for this value.
